statements.sql: select * from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'xremit_pro_v2' and table_name = 'script' and table_type = 'BASE TABLE'

update `site_sections` set `value` = '{\"image\":\"seeder\/bg1.png\",\"language\":{\"en\":{\"heading\":\"Seamless Money Transfer, Worldwide Connection\",\"sub_heading\":\"we believe in connecting hearts and empowering dreams through secure, fast, and reliable money transfers. Whether you\u2019re sending support to family abroad or facilitating international business transactions, our cutting-edge remittance solution is your trusted partner.\",\"button_name\":\"Join Today\",\"video_link\":\"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/embed\/7p6hG3plQj4?si=KNjywn8p37nLnLRC\"},\"es\":{\"heading\":\"Transferencia de dinero sin problemas, conexi\u00f3n mundial\",\"sub_heading\":\"Creemos en conectar corazones y potenciar sue\u00f1os a trav\u00e9s de transferencias de dinero seguras, r\u00e1pidas y confiables. Ya sea que est\u00e9 enviando apoyo a familiares en el extranjero o facilitando transacciones comerciales internacionales, nuestra soluci\u00f3n de remesas de vanguardia es su socio de confianza.\",\"button_name\":\"\u00danete hoy\",\"video_link\":\"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/embed\/7p6hG3plQj4?si=KNjywn8p37nLnLRC\"},\"ar\":{\"heading\":\"\u062a\u062d\u0648\u064a\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u0623\u0645\u0648\u0627\u0644 \u0628\u0633\u0644\u0627\u0633\u0629\u060c \u0627\u062a\u0635\u0627\u0644 \u0639\u0627\u0644\u0645\u064a\",\"sub_heading\":\"\u0646\u062d\u0646 \u0646\u0624\u0645\u0646 \u0628\u0623\u0647\u0645\u064a\u0629 \u0631\u0628\u0637 \u0627\u0644\u0642\u0644\u0648\u0628 \u0648\u062a\u0645\u0643\u064a\u0646 \u0627\u0644\u0623\u062d\u0644\u0627\u0645 \u0645\u0646 \u062e\u0644\u0627\u0644 \u062a\u062d\u0648\u064a\u0644\u0627\u062a \u0645\u0627\u0644\u064a\u0629 \u0622\u0645\u0646\u0629 \u0648\u0633\u0631\u064a\u0639\u0629 \u0648\u0645\u0648\u062b\u0648\u0642\u0629. \u0633\u0648\u0627\u0621 \u0643\u0646\u062a \u062a\u0631\u0633\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u062f\u0639\u0645 \u0644\u0639\u0627\u0626\u0644\u062a\u0643 \u0641\u064a \u0627\u0644\u062e\u0627\u0631\u062c \u0623\u0648 \u062a\u0633\u0647\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0639\u0627\u0645\u0644\u0627\u062a \u0627\u0644\u062a\u062c\u0627\u0631\u064a\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u062f\u0648\u0644\u064a\u0629\u060c \u0641\u0625\u0646 \u062d\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u062d\u0648\u064a\u0644\u0627\u062a \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062a\u0637\u0648\u0631 \u0644\u062f\u064a\u0646\u0627 \u0647\u0648 \u0634\u0631\u064a\u0643\u0643 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0648\u062b\u0648\u0642 \u0628\u0647.\",\"button_name\":\"\u0627\u0646\u0636\u0645 \u0627\u0644\u064a\u0648\u0645\",\"video_link\":\"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/embed\/7p6hG3plQj4?si=KNjywn8p37nLnLRC\"}}}', `site_sections`.`updated_at` = '2023-10-22 07:31:13' where `id` = 3
bindings: {"image":"seeder\/bg1.png","language":{"en":{"heading":"Seamless Money Transfer, Worldwide Connection","sub_heading":"we believe in connecting hearts and empowering dreams through secure, fast, and reliable money transfers. request.request_request:
array:13 [
  "_token" => "og6iGrxpX7wSNfWaFv6h9vZkRWr7xRmeaS9YSgXW"
  "en_heading" => "Seamless Money Transfer, Worldwide Connection"
  "en_sub_heading" => "we believe in connecting hearts and empowering dreams through secure, fast, and reliable money transfers. Whether you’re sending support to family abroad or facilitating international business transactions, our cutting-edge remittance solution is your trusted partner."
  "en_button_name" => "Join Today"
  "en_video_link" => "https://www.youtube.com/embed/7p6hG3plQj4?si=KNjywn8p37nLnLRC"
  "es_heading" => "Transferencia de dinero sin problemas, conexión mundial"
  "es_sub_heading" => "Creemos en conectar corazones y potenciar sueños a través de transferencias de dinero seguras, rápidas y confiables. Ya sea que esté enviando apoyo a familiares en el extranjero o facilitando transacciones comerciales internacionales, nuestra solución de remesas de vanguardia es su socio de confianza."
  "es_button_name" => "Únete hoy"
  "es_video_link" => "https://www.youtube.com/embed/7p6hG3plQj4?si=KNjywn8p37nLnLRC"
  "ar_heading" => "تحويل الأموال بسلاسة، اتصال عالمي"
  "ar_sub_heading" => "نحن نؤمن بأهمية ربط القلوب وتمكين الأحلام من خلال تحويلات مالية آمنة وسريعة وموثوقة. سواء كنت ترسل الدعم لعائلتك في الخارج أو تسهل المعاملات التجارية الدولية، فإن حل التحويلات المتطور لدينا هو شريكك الموثوق به."
  "ar_button_name" => "انضم اليوم"
  "ar_video_link" => "https://www.youtube.com/embed/7p6hG3plQj4?si=KNjywn8p37nLnLRC"
]
